COLLECTION

Roadmap

  • EARN STAKES IN K9'S

    We are offering the community a unique experience to own part of K9's by interacting with the giveaways in our discord. We do game nights, meme contests, and riddle nights.

  • PRESALE

    A presale will be held at the price of 0.05 ETH per K9 to allow early supporters the opportunity to mint for a reduced price, 750 whitelist members will have access to this with a purchase limit of 3 per wallet.

  • PUBLIC SALE

    After the presale window is finished the public sale will go live at a price of 0.06 ETH per K9 and we will be listed on marketplaces.

  • COMMUNITY WALLET

    The community wallet will be opened and 50% of all royalties will be deposited monthly as well as 10% of the initial mint to ensure growth and longevity of the project. The wallet will be controlled by community polls, these polls will be created using suggestions that come from the community members and will be picked via a combination of input from members and the support team. The most popular option will then be carried forward. (e.g. Purchasing land in the metaverse, Sweeping the floor, Hiring a team to further the marketing reach and brand management). YOU decide!

    • $25,000 CHARITY GIVEAWAY

      The K9 team is stoked to announce that upon full mint there will be a $25,000 giveaway to an animal related charity voted for by the community. The community will also be able to vote for it to be split between multiple charities. In the event that a full mint is not achieved, then a % of the $25,000 equivalent to the total % minted will be donated to ensure we give back regardless of the situation.

    • PLP (project launchpad)

      More information on the PLP can be found in our whitepaper linked within the discord.

    • MERCH DROP

      There will be limited releases of merch based around some of the most unique K9 designs. The community will decide which items get pushed through for manufacturing and redistribution!

    • TOKEN

      $CANINE Token will be launched. The exact details on the uses and functionality of $CANINE can be found below.

    • AIRDROPS

      The community will decide the theme of a free airdrop of a future companion collection. This will be given out to long term holders and new investors in K9's. There will also be a small public sale of the new collection to help people join us and further develop the community wallet. It is important to note that this step will only occur if the community approves it.

    • THE METAVERSE

      Our team's ultimate goal is to purchase land in the metaverse where K9 owners can have their own K9 turned into an avatar and meet other owners whilst using $CANINE to purchase digital accessories as well as real world supplies! The community will decide what direction the future steps are taken in. We look forward to you joining us!



UTILITY

PLP (Project launchpad platform): An NFT collective created with the intention of helping K9 holders launch their NFT projects. With access and support from devs, proven team members, mods, artists etc. Projects will be approved and funded by the K9 community.

$CANINE Token will be introduced $CANINE will be exchangeable for $ETH but most importantly, in our K9 store!!! What is the pet K9 store? The store will be a place where you can exchange $CANINE for animal supplies, such as dog food and pet accessories. We will not be limiting the products to exclusively dog related supplies as we understand there is a huge range of pets our community loves and cares for. We plan to expand this store and collaborate with large charities and companies to grow and provide as much benefit to the widest audience possible. If you're reading this, we can all agree that Web3 is a big part of the future.

For those of you who don't have a pet, the token will also be exchangeable for raffle tickets that we will host for a whole variety of prizes, such as sought after NFT's outside of our own collection, Holidays and much more. Why purchase through the store? Whilst you are able to exchange $CANINE for $ETH and therefore other tokens, we encourage you to use the store as 10% of revenue through the store will be set aside into an accumulating pool. Once a month verified K9 holders will vote on a set of charities to receive the funding from this pool! This will be entirely non-profit. How do I earn $CANINE ? To earn the token you simply need to be a holder of a K9, the more K9's you hold the more $CANINE you will yield.

About K9's

K9's is a collection of 4,444 autonomously generated 3D cyber dogs who prowl the desolate streets of the future!

It is the year 3,021, the metaverse has seen changes that no one thought possible. The early years were dominated by Punks and Apes, historians often note these as the beginning of Metalation (the mass adoption of the metaverse).

Following The early explosion and domination, the metaverse was overrun by creatures from every walk of life, Penguins with bad diets, lions that couldn't keep quiet, animals, aliens, warriors, and apes of every shape and size. But as the metaverse exploded, gas wars broke loose, and the metaworld resorted to chaos. This chaos ensued for centuries, new armies entering everyday and fighting for the MetaCrown. Through this chaos, armies rose and armies fell, but at the end of the day, one unsuspecting pack remained prosperous for the entire Millenia, the K9's. Originally founded by the K-9, a small pack of just 9 dogs, with genetic traits that have mutated so significantly that there has never been another dog like them, and there never will be.

The K-9 were able to build a pack of 4,444 K9's ranging from all over the MetaWorld, and unlike dogs anyone had ever seen before. Historians theorize to this day how these 4,444 K9's managed to maintain their presence and dominance for so long, the resilience, strength, and perseverance has not been demonstrated by anyone to this level. Despite multiple theories, there is one that has gained the most traction amongst the notable Meta-historians. The K9's are a pack. No dog ate, unless the whole pack was feeding, no dog made decisions without hearing the pack howl, and there was not one leader, but 4,444. The K9's moved as a pack into unknown corners of the metaverse, making moves that no one thought possible. These are the sentiments of the great historians of the metaverse, but the ones who know best, are the K9's. December 20th, 2021, is a day written in the coding of the metaverse, as the day the Pack was born, the pack that changed the course of history in a way no one could have imagined. 4,444 K9's, the howl heard for millennia.

Our Team

100% transparency between the K9 team and community is of the utmost importance to us. Any major decision for the project will be a combination of input from the team as well as the community. This will help us create value and a healthy atmosphere for our community; every opinion matters. It will allow the team to rollout changes that the community wants to see.
